author: Mohamed Oumoumad
description: Render a maya scene without opening it

params.name: maya Render exe
params.tooltip: The path to your Render executable from maya bin directory, if you already have it in your PATH environement variable, then just put 'Render'

params.name: Renderer
params.tooltip: The Renderer that will be used (ex : 'arnold' or 'turtle') if left empty the one stored in the file will be used

params.name: Set project
params.tooltip: Use this Maya project to load the file

params.name: Camera name
params.tooltip: Specify which camera to be rendered, if left empty the renderable one in the file will be used

params.name: Starting frame
params.tooltip: Starting frame for an animation sequence

params.name: End frame
params.tooltip: End frame for an animation sequence

params.name: By frame
params.tooltip: By frame (or step) for an animation sequence

params.name: X resolution
params.tooltip: Set X resolution, if left empty the one in the file will be used

params.name: Y resolution
params.tooltip: Set Y resolution, if left empty the one in the file will be used

params.name: Resolution persentage
params.tooltip: Set the persentage of the resolution to be used

params.name: Output name
params.tooltip: input the file name, if left empty the one specified in the file will be used

params.name: Output directory
params.tooltip: Directory in which to store rendered image file, if left empty the one in the file will be used
